```{r}
power2 <- 2^(0:10)
power2 <- append(power2, 0, 0)
power2
```


for(threshold in power2) {
  filter(year2010, num_email > threshold) %>%
    count() %>%
    print()
  
}

```{r}
filter(year2010, num_email > power2) %>% count()
#ddply(year2010, )


mod_func <- function(arr, df, x) {   
  arr <- filter(df, num_email > x) %>%
    count()
  return(arr)
}

ddply(power2, mod_func, df=year2010, x=power2)
```

```{r}
for(i in power2) {
  df <- year2010 %>%
    filter(num_email > i)
  
  g <- graph_from_data_frame(df, directed = FALSE, vertices = NULL)
  
  nodes <- gorder(g)
  edges <- gsize(g)
  
  num_connect_comps <- no.clusters(g)
  clus <- clusters(g)

  test <- groups(clus)
  
  d <- adply(test, '1', length)

  max_num_nodes_comp <- max(d$V1)
  

  

}
```
